Description: Figurine of blue frit, lion with the head of a ram, lying on a base, mane and tail of a lion, front paws stretched out, among them remains of a possible figure ? but this part was broken and glued back together and is not recognizable very well. The drawing shows that this part consisted of a wider upper and a thinner lower part. The head of the ram shows a perforation where once a crown of copper was attached, as is still visible on the drawing of the object card
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.5, over level 3
